name: Import Export Tracker
description: Ideal for those who are looking to keep track of their import and export of products.Are you looking for a tracker to keep track of import and export of products under one dashboard?This tracker is perfect to quickly add products for import and export, and keep complete overview of the total import and export of the different products under one dashboard.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?Au
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Install the extension and setup the automation.; One-time setup and configuration; Quick 5-minute installation process; Copy Notion Database properties placeholders; Paste them into your Google Document template; One-time setup per document template; Set your preferred automation schedule; Automatically scans Notion database
